name: Process Monitoring Tool
tagline: Gain full transparency over your business processes in real-time.
summary: Our Process Monitoring Tool is a turnkey solution for monitoring and analyzing your critical business operations. Track the status of processes, identify sources of error immediately, and analyze XML data without in-depth database knowledge. A flexible and universal application for any project.

features.title: Fast Information Access
features.description: Get instant access to process data directly from your database without complex queries.

features.title: Intuitive Process Overview
features.description: View and sort all processes by status (Successful, Failed, etc.) at a glance.

features.title: Flexible Filters & Search
features.description: Use powerful filtering and search functions to find exactly the information you need.

features.title: Transparent Process Steps
features.description: Visualize every single step of a process between different systems (CRM, CPQ, DB).

features.title: XML Analysis
features.description: Check transmitted XML data directly in the tool to quickly diagnose and resolve errors.

features.title: Universal Compatibility
features.description: Easy setup via IIS and connection to any database (MS SQL, PostgreSQL, etc.).

content.text: The Solution for Complex Process Landscapes

In modern IT systems, countless processes run between different applications. Keeping an overview and quickly identifying errors can become an enormous challenge without the right tool. Our Process Monitoring Tool was developed to close this exact gap. It is a ready-to-use solution that gives you a clear and understandable view of your data flows, without you having to delve into the depths of the database or the complexity of systems like BizTalk.

Whether you want to monitor processes locally or on a server, the flexible configuration via IIS or IIS Express makes setup straightforward. The tool is designed as a universal solution and can be adapted to any project and business requirement.
